name: Project 22
description:
Project 22:

Project 22 is a fun addicting game that puts your reflexes to the test. Your goal is to collect as many squares as possible before your life runs out. The longer you stay alive, the faster the game gets! Play 5 different game modes with unique mechanics, and vibrant visual effects. Project 22 was made in less than 24 hours!

Game Designed and Programmed by Matt MB

Music By Kevin Macleod

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Change Direction

Q - Back to Main Menu
